name: gradlew
description: Android Gradle Wrapper for building and managing Android projects

custom.default: While Android Gradle operations run, consider reviewing build.gradle files, planning test strategies, or analyzing Android app architecture for optimization opportunities.
custom.assemble: Assembling Android APK/AAB - consider code signing, release preparation, or app store optimization.
custom.install: Installing app on device - plan testing scenarios, user experience validation, or performance analysis.
custom.lint: Running Android lint checks - review code quality suggestions, plan refactoring, or work on accessibility improvements.

hints.build: Building Android project - review compilation output for warnings, plan deployment steps, or work on app documentation.
hints.test: Running Android tests - analyze test patterns, consider additional test cases, or review test coverage strategies.

subcommand.name: tasks
subcommand.description: Display available Gradle tasks

options.name: all
options.description: Show all tasks including those normally hidden

subcommand.name: help
subcommand.description: Display help information

options.name: task
options.description: Show help for a specific task

subcommand.name: dependencies
subcommand.description: Display project dependencies

subcommand.name: properties
subcommand.description: Display project properties

subcommand.name: signingReport
subcommand.description: Display signing information for build variants

subcommand.name: sourceSets
subcommand.description: Display source sets defined in the project

subcommand.name: androidDependencies
subcommand.description: Display Android dependencies of the project

subcommand.name: clean
subcommand.description: Delete the build directory

subcommand.name: build
subcommand.description: Assemble and test the project (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: buildDebug
subcommand.description: Assemble and test the debug variant (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: buildRelease
subcommand.description: Assemble and test the release variant (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: assemble
subcommand.description: Assemble main outputs for all variants (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: assembleDebug
subcommand.description: Assemble debug variant of the app (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: assembleRelease
subcommand.description: Assemble release variant of the app (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: assembleAndroidTest
subcommand.description: Assemble all test applications (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: assembleUnitTest
subcommand.description: Assemble all unit test applications (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: compileDebugSources
subcommand.description: Compile debug sources (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: compileReleaseSources
subcommand.description: Compile release sources (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: compileDebugAndroidTestSources
subcommand.description: Compile debug Android test sources (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: compileDebugUnitTestSources
subcommand.description: Compile debug unit test sources (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: compileReleaseUnitTestSources
subcommand.description: Compile release unit test sources (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: bundle
subcommand.description: Assemble bundles for all variants (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: bundleDebug
subcommand.description: Assemble debug Android App Bundle (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: bundleRelease
subcommand.description: Assemble release Android App Bundle (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: buildKotlinToolingMetadata
subcommand.description: Build metadata json file containing information about used Kotlin tooling (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: buildDependents
subcommand.description: Assemble and test this project and all projects that depend on it (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: buildNeeded
subcommand.description: Assemble and test this project and all projects it depends on (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: installDebug
subcommand.description: Install the debug build on connected devices (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: installRelease
subcommand.description: Install the release build on connected devices (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: installDebugAndroidTest
subcommand.description: Install Android test app for debug build (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: uninstallDebug
subcommand.description: Uninstall the debug build from connected devices (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: uninstallRelease
subcommand.description: Uninstall the release build from connected devices (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: uninstallDebugAndroidTest
subcommand.description: Uninstall the Android test app for debug build (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: uninstallAll
subcommand.description: Uninstall all applications from connected devices (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: test
subcommand.description: Run unit tests for all variants (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: testDebugUnitTest
subcommand.description: Run unit tests for the debug build (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: testReleaseUnitTest
subcommand.description: Run unit tests for the release build (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: connectedCheck
subcommand.description: Run all device checks on currently connected devices (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: connectedAndroidTest
subcommand.description: Install and run instrumentation tests for all flavors on connected devices (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: connectedDebugAndroidTest
subcommand.description: Install and run tests for debug on connected devices (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: deviceAndroidTest
subcommand.description: Install and run instrumentation tests using all Device Providers (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: deviceCheck
subcommand.description: Run all device checks using Device Providers and Test Servers (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: check
subcommand.description: Run all checks without building (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: checkJetifier
subcommand.description: Check whether Jetifier is needed for the current project

subcommand.name: checkKotlinGradlePluginConfigurationErrors
subcommand.description: Check Kotlin Gradle Plugin configuration errors

subcommand.name: lint
subcommand.description: Run lint on the default variant (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: lintDebug
subcommand.description: Run lint on debug variant and show text output (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: lintRelease
subcommand.description: Run lint on release variant and show text output (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: lintVitalRelease
subcommand.description: Run vital lint checks on release variant (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: lintFix
subcommand.description: Run lint and apply safe suggestions to source code (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)

subcommand.name: updateLintBaseline
subcommand.description: Update the lint baseline using the default variant (Runs asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately)
